nodes.title: Video settings
widgets_values:
If low on Ram/Vram, try width height to 832 x 480 or 960 x 544.  If you can, run at 1280 x 720 or higher.


Length in seconds :  try 5, 10 or 20. 
fps : 24 or 25 (or 48 or 50 if your pc can run it)

nodes.title: About Size
widgets_values:
Width & height settings must be divisible by 32 + 1. 
Frame count must be divisible by 8 + 1. 


Running with invalid parameters **will not cause errors**. Instead, the flow will silently choose the closest valid parameters. 

By default, we are using 720p resolution. You can try 1920*1088 if you have a powerful GPU.

nodes.title: IMPORTANT LORA!
widgets_values:
For this K-Sampler workflow to work, you must use the Image-2-Video adapter lora from here :

https://huggingface.co/MachineDelusions/LTX-2_Image2Video_Adapter_LoRa

nodes.title: Distill lora (Only if using DEV model)
Prompting LTX-2
widgets_values:
## LTX-2 Prompting Tips
1. **Core Actions**: Describe events and actions as they occur over time  
2. **Audio**: Describe sounds and dialogue needed for the scene  
3. **Reference Image**: Do not repeat details already present  
4. **Consistency**: Avoid instructions that do not match the reference image, as this will degrade results

blurry, out of focus, overexposed, underexposed, low contrast, washed out colors, excessive noise, grainy texture, poor lighting, flickering, motion blur, distorted proportions, unnatural skin tones, deformed facial features, asymmetrical face, missing facial features, extra limbs, disfigured hands, wrong hand count, artifacts around text, inconsistent perspective, camera shake, incorrect depth of field, background too sharp, background clutter, distracting reflections, harsh shadows, inconsistent lighting direction, color banding, cartoonish rendering, 3D CGI look, unrealistic materials, uncanny valley effect, incorrect ethnicity, wrong gender, exaggerated expressions, wrong gaze direction, mismatched lip sync, silent or muted audio, distorted voice, robotic voice, echo, background noise, off-sync audio, incorrect dialogue, added dialogue, repetitive speech, jittery movement, awkward pauses, incorrect timing, unnatural transitions, inconsistent framing, tilted camera, flat lighting, inconsistent tone, cinematic oversaturation, stylized filters, or AI artifacts.

Style: 3D animated, whimsical - The woman and the fluffy gray kitten are standing together in a sunny, open field surrounded by tall grass. The woman is belting out a cheerful tune in a powerful, alto voice, singing: "Oh, the wild blue sky is our stage today!" The kitten, looking up and slightly shy, joins in with a quiet, high-pitched voice, adding: "And the whole world hears us sing!" The sound of their singing is accompanied by the gentle rustling of leaves and the cheerful chirping of unseen birds.
